name: email_clone
description: Fake Email Clone with JS , MySQL and Node
author: Saphal Poudyal

scripts.install: cd ./server/ && yarn install && cd ../client/client_sender && yarn install && cd ../client_main/ && yarn install
scripts.test: cd ./server/ && yarn run test && cd ../client/client_sender && yarn run test && cd ../client_main/ && yarn run test
scripts.lint: cd ./server/ && yarn eslint . && cd ../client/client_sender && yarn eslint . && cd ../client_main/ && yarn eslint .
